mapper.select: SELECT f.`publication`,f.`check_no`,c.`company_name` ,f.content FROM flight_check f,company c,product p,z_product_type z WHERE p.`company_id`=c.`id` AND f.`product_id`=p.`product_id`AND p.product_type_id=z.id AND z.id=1 ;
